a.n: Le Beau Vélo De Ravel I

p.d: Unmissable Brussels! Accompanied by Jérôme de Warzée, Adrien Joveneau sets off from the Atomium, built for the Universal Exhibition of 1958, then visits Tour & Taxis before heading to the Schuman roundabout and meeting the Michelin-starred chef Isabelle Arpin. Finally, Pierre Theunis awaits the group at Cinquantenaire park. Presenter: Adrien Joveneau.
